mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS rowno FROM ( SELECT AJBH,AJMC,FADDXZ,TO_CHAR(FXSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') as FXSJ,AJLX,ZBR_XM,ZBR_SFZH,ZBDW_BH FROM SJJH_WA_AJXX where 1=1
and AJBH like '%${ajbh}%'
and AJMC like '%' || #{caseName} || '%'
and ZBDW_BH in (${orgCode})
ORDER BY FXSJ DESC) tt) table_alias
WHERE table_alias.rowno BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT count(1) FROM SJJH_WA_AJXX where 1=1
and AJBH like '%${ajbh}%'
and AJMC like '%' || #{caseName} || '%'
and ZBDW_BH in (${orgCode})
SELECT AJBH,RYBH FROM SJJH_WA_RYXX where ZJHM = #{zjhm} and to_char(LRSJ, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_char(sysdate-3,'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ORDER BY LRSJ desc
